Implemented design patterns to simplify error handling throughout the system.
Aided in enhancing the development cycle of Jira Monolith by setting up a remote development environment as a proof of concept (POC).

Ran experimentation to strategically enable Timeline by default for users, and findings indicated favorable user response üëç

Helped new engineers and interns learn and grow.
Led the Scrum team to work effectively.
Kept improving existing setups to make them work better.
Engineered and maintained a diverse range of services vital for ensuring the reliability and performance of VMware Cloud on AWS.
Led discussions, designs, and development efforts for novel features and microservices, emphasizing scalability and extensibility.
Applied industry-standard Design Patterns to optimize the architecture and efficiency of solutions.
Actively engaged in internal innovation events such as Borathons (Hackathons) and RADIO (internal platform for research work sharing) to foster creativity and knowledge-sharing.
Experimentation with new Docker images to enhance system functionality and flexibility.
Continuously optimized and refined existing implementations to elevate performance and user experience.

keyPoints: Directed the design and development of a flagship Business-to-Business (B2B) product tailored for E-commerce and Surface Shipments, leveraging Django, AngularJS, and MySQL technologies on AWS.

Introduced and configured rate-limiting and throttling mechanisms for exposed REST APIs utilizing Django-Ratelimit, bolstering system security and stability.
Strategically optimized cloud resource costs by meticulously selecting appropriate EC2 instances, ensuring optimal performance while maximizing cost-efficiency.
